subject: Check out my photos on Facebook
author: Mick Retort

Hi evp-itc@yahoogroups.com,

I set up a Facebook profile where I can post m=
y pictures, videos and events and I want to add you as a friend so you can =
see it. First, you need to join Facebook! Once you join, you can also creat=
e your own profile.

Thanks,
Mick

To sign up for Facebook, follow the link=
 below:
http://www.facebook.com/p.php?i=3D100000211513940&k=3DZ6E3Y5UZT26DV=
FDJPB63QTSQPVJG453&r


evp-itc@yahoogroups.com was invited to join Facebook=
 by Mick Retort. If you do not wish to receive this type of email from Face=
book in the future, please click on the link below to unsubscribe.
http://w=
ww.facebook.com/o.php?k=3De4ed4f&u=3D100000223394233&mid=3D104dee6G5af31dca=
f9b9G0G8
Facebook's offices are located at 1601 S. California Ave., Palo Al=
to, CA 94304.


--b1_dbc63a4006be83cef3b9203399870390
